connect4

Class MotorFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • connect4.MotorFunctions

  • public class MotorFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that controls the motor functions; moving, turning and stopping the motors.
    Author:
    jetro, kim, pietari, olli
